mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT vsmrr.id) FROM ${tablePrefix}space_member_role_rel vsmrr JOIN ${tablePrefix}space_role_resource_rel vsrrr ON vsmrr.role_code = vsrrr.role_code WHERE vsmrr.space_id = #{spaceId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${tablePrefix}unit_member WHERE space_id = #{spaceId} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${tablePrefix}unit_team WHERE space_id = #{spaceId} and is_deleted = 0 and parent_id > 0
select COUNT(*) from ${tablePrefix}node where space_id = #{spaceId} and `type` in (2, 3, 4) and is_template = 0 and is_rubbish = 0

SELECT SUM(JSON_LENGTH(vdm.meta_data -> '$.views[0].rows')) FROM ${tablePrefix}datasheet_meta vdm, ${tablePrefix}datasheet vd WHERE vdm.dst_id = vd.dst_id AND vdm.is_deleted = 0 AND vd.is_deleted = 0 AND vd.space_id = #{spaceId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${tablePrefix}node WHERE space_id = #{spaceId} AND `type` = 9 AND is_template = 0 AND is_rubbish = 0
SELECT file_size FROM ${tablePrefix}space_asset WHERE space_id = #{spaceId} AND cite > 0 AND is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY asset_id
SELECT SUM(IF(control_type = 0, 1, 0)) AS nodeRoleCount, SUM(IF(control_type = 1, 1, 0)) AS fieldRoleCount FROM ${tablePrefix}control WHERE space_id = #{spaceId} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT SUM(IF(`type` = 2, 1, 0)) AS fileCount, SUM(IF(`type` = 3, 1, 0)) AS formCount FROM ${tablePrefix}node WHERE space_id = #{spaceId} AND is_rubbish = 0 AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT type, COUNT(*) AS total FROM ${tablePrefix}node WHERE space_id = #{spaceId} AND is_rubbish = 0 AND is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY type
